thread.title: Winter weather advisories Friday and Saturday in KMAland | Breaking Weather | kmaland.com
thread.title_full: Winter weather advisories Friday and Saturday in KMAland | Breaking Weather | kmaland.com

author: Mike Peterson
title: Winter weather advisories Friday and Saturday in KMAland | Breaking Weather | kmaland.com
text:
URGENT - WINTER WEATHER MESSAGE
National Weather Service Omaha/Valley NE
235 PM CST Thu Dec 12 2024
Harrison-Shelby-Pottawattamie-Mills-Montgomery-Fremont-
Page-Douglas-Sarpy-Seward-Lancaster-Cass-Otoe-Johnson-Nemaha-Pawnee-Richardson
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 9 AM CST
SATURDAY...
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up
to one inch and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch.
* WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa and east
central, northeast, and southeast Nebraska.
* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Friday evening commute, especially
near and south of Interstate 80.
Audubon-Guthrie-Cass-Adair-Adams-Union-Taylor-Ringgold
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations under one inch and ice accumulations around one to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central Iowa. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions Friday night and into Saturday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
Atchison MO-Nodaway-Worth-Gentry-Holt ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze to a few hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Atchison, Holt, Nodaway, Andrew, Worth, Gentry, and DeKalb counties in northwest Missouri. * WHEN...From 2 PM Friday to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle or light freezing rain is expected to develop Friday afternoon. Temperatures will slowly warm during the evening hours, with precipitation expected to become plain rain late Friday night. A few hours of icy conditions may occur, primarily around and just after the evening commute. Thank you for reading kmaland.com At KMA, we attempt to be accurate in our reporting. If you see a typo or mistake in a story, please contact us by emailing kmaradio@kmaland.com.
